changelog:
## Changes in v1.0.35

### Bug Fixes (Sport Section)
- Fixed channel number and UP/DOWN navigation when opening channels from Sport section
- Channel now opens exactly like TV section (correct number, correct navigation)
- Channels are loaded from database before fullscreen for accurate positioning

### Diagnostics
- Added startup logging to diagnose dark screen issue after app update

### Previous fixes
- v1.0.33: Fixed focus restoration in Search section
